predicate.note: Frames file for 'subpoena' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to serve or summon with a subpoena

example.name: transitive
example.text: Pan Am has subpoenaed several government agencies , including the CIA and FBI , [*] to determine whether they were warned [*-1] that a bomb had been planted [*-2] aboard a jet that [*T*-3] exploded over Scotland last December , [*-4] killing 270 people .
example.arg: several government agencies , including the CIA and FBI ,
[*] to determine whether they were warned [*-1] that a bomb had been planted [*-2] aboard a jet that [*T*-3] exploded over Scotland last December , [*-4] killing 270 people
